propositions.text: 嫣然笑靥，倾尽天下，江山倾覆，只为你倾情。
倾世VIP+ING，倾情VIP+ING。
第七世倾城，你何时才能嫁我？
“倾城，嫁给我！”
“抱歉，我不能嫁给你。”
“为什么？”
“因为你是皇帝，而我是沦落凡尘的妖。”
“为何要承受如此之痛？我该如何做才能让你不离开？”
“你太强，而我太弱。我早已注定要离开。我与你之间，注定遥远。”
第七世倾城，你真的不怪我吗？
“倾城，为何你从不怪我？”
“我只怪我自己，没有能力保护你。
我只怪我自己，没有资格陪在你身边。
你给了我一个盛世，我却只还给你一个空壳。
这是你想要的吗？
你给了我太多，我只剩一颗心。
如果可以，我愿倾尽一切。
“只为换你一个回眸。”
“为何你如此执着？”
“因为你是我的全部。”
“我只剩一颗心，你为何如此执着？”
“因为你是我的一切。”

concepts.name: 倾城
concepts.context: The name of a character, likely the central female character, addressed and spoken to throughout the text.

concepts.name: 你
concepts.context: Refers to '倾城' in the dialogue.

concepts.name: 我
concepts.context: Refers to the speaker in the dialogue, likely the emperor addressing '倾城'.

concepts.name: 皇帝
concepts.context: Describes the role of the speaker in relation to '倾城'.

concepts.name: 妖
concepts.context: Describes the identity of '倾城' in relation to the emperor.

concepts.name: 心
concepts.context: Metaphorical representation of emotions or self, stated as being all that remains for the speaker.

concepts.name: 执着
concepts.context: Describes the nature of the speaker's feelings or actions towards '倾城'.

concepts.name: 一切
concepts.context: Refers to the totality of what '倾城' represents to the speaker.

concepts.name: 全部
concepts.context: Similar to '一切', signifying the complete importance of '倾城' to the speaker.

concepts.name: 盛世
concepts.context: A prosperous era, gifted by the speaker to '倾城'.

concepts.name: 空壳
concepts.context: What the speaker feels they have returned to '倾城' in contrast to the '盛世'.

concepts.name: 回眸
concepts.context: A look back, desired by the speaker from '倾城'.

hierarchy.structure: The document begins with a title and a brief introductory quote. It then moves into a prologue section, followed by two chapters, each titled 'VS 倾城' and containing dialogue that explores a past relationship and its unresolved emotional complexities.
